rahathwana awasthawedi daknata labenne bhawanga chiththa prabhaswarathwaya thula athi me jathi jara marana namathi anithya, dukkha, anathma lakshana yi.bhawanga chiththayehi prabhaswara wu aalokaya nirwanalokaya yi waradawa watahagena, ehi bandi sitina yogawacharaya, sansaraye digin digatama jathi, jara, maranadi duk gena dena bhawanga chiththaya gana kalakiri ehi prabhaswara wu aalokaya kerehi athikaragath bandima bindi gos, witharagayen wimukthiya udawi, uthum wu arahath palayata pathwanne, bhawanga chiththayehi anithya, dukkha, anathma swabhawaya sakshath wu pasu ya.prabhaswara wu bhawanga chiththayen nikuthwana aalokaya niwemin dalwemin dawena swabhawayen yuktha anithya dharmayak wuwada nirwanaye aalokaya niwimak dalwimak dawimak ha anithyathawayak nathi asankhatha dharmayaki.
